LanguageData.VPE.SpendPoints: Spend points on unlocking new paths, unlocking psycasts, unlocking meditation foci, improving stats, etc.
LanguageData.VPE.PsysetDesc: Drag and drop learnt psycasts into psysets that you can cycle between ingame.
LanguageData.VPE.DestroySkipdoor.Desc: Destroy this skipdoor. It will no longer be usable, but will no longer impact the max heat of {0}.
LanguageData.VPE.CancelSkipbarrierDesc: Click to cancel Skipbarrier on the caster.
LanguageData.VPE.SellingEltexWarning: Selling Eltex is against Imperial law. This may or may not affect your relations with the Empire in the future.
LanguageData.VPE.GiftingEltexWarning: Gifting Eltex is against Imperial law. This may or may not affect your relations with the Empire in the future.
LanguageData.VPE.EmpireAngeredDesc: Empire caught wind that you have been {0} Eltex behind their back. They consider it to be against Imperial law, and your relations have degraded.
LanguageData.VPE.PsycasterRaidDescription:
{0}
Capturing psycasters is a viable strategy and can be considered beneficial.
